desc_incomplete.text: ![CDATA[Congratulations! All party preparations are complete. Hit NEXT to drive Lori to the party or BACK to finish collecting game medals.]]

desc_complete.text: ![CDATA[Congratulations! All party preparations are complete. Hit NEXT to drive Lori to the party.]]

desc_desk.text: ![CDATA[It's Lori's birthday, and everyone is making sure it's a party to remember, with a spectacular picnic in Ketcham Park. Pull the whole thing together with Lincoln, Clyde, Ronnie Anne and Bobby.]]

desc_mob.text: ![CDATA[It's Lori's birthday, and everyone is making sure it's a party to remember, with a spectacular picnic in Ketcham Park. Pull the whole thing together with Lincoln, Clyde, Ronnie Anne and Bobby.]]

desc_desk.text: ![CDATA[Use the arrow keys to move around. Collect things or use items by hitting the space bar or mouse button.]]

desc_mob.text: ![CDATA[Use the d-pad to move around. Collect things by tapping the screen.]]

desc_desk.text: ![CDATA[These circles will appear over objects and the Loud sisters. Press space bar or click in the circle to talk to them. You can also drag certain objects onto the circle from your item bag.]]

desc_mob.text: ![CDATA[These circles will appear over objects and the Loud sisters. Tap in the circle to talk to them. You can also drag certain objects onto the circle from your item bag.]]

desc_desk.text: ![CDATA[All task information can be found on your phone. It will also alert you to any new messages.]]

desc_mob.text: ![CDATA[All task information can be found on your phone. It will also alert you to any new messages.]]

desc_desk.text: ![CDATA[Open your phone and click the map button to see the map. Clicking on a location icon will take you there.]]

desc_mob.text: ![CDATA[Open your phone and tap the map button to see the map. Tapping on a location icon will take you there.]]

desc_desk.text: ![CDATA[Lincoln is joined by Clyde, Ronnie Anne and Bobby. Click on the character button to change character. Remember, some characters can't complete certain tasks so try switching if you are stuck. Good luck!]]

desc_mob.text: ![CDATA[Lincoln is joined by Clyde, Ronnie Anne and Bobby. Tap on the character button to change character. Remember, some characters can't complete certain tasks so try switching if you are stuck. Good luck!]]

desc_desk.text: ![CDATA[All party preparations performed perfectly. Now all you need is Lori!]]

desc_mob.text: ![CDATA[All party preparations performed perfectly. Now all you need is Lori!]]

desc_desk.text: ![CDATA[Use the arrow keys to move around. Don‚Äôt let Lori see any other guests or the surprise will be ruined!]]

desc_mob.text: ![CDATA[Use the D-pad to move around. Don‚Äôt let Lori see any other guests or the surprise will be ruined!]]

desc_desk.text: ![CDATA[There are 5 extra gifts to pick up on the way. When you have them all head to the green map pin!]]

desc_mob.text: ![CDATA[There are 5 extra gifts to pick up on the way. When you have them all head to the green map pin!]]

task_one_overview.text: ![CDATA[Picnic blanket, blowing away. Need 4 heavy objects ASAP.]]

task_one_objective.text: ![CDATA[Find 4 heavy items to weigh the picnic blanket down.]]

task_two_overview.text: ![CDATA[To complete my calculations I need to access a military weather satellite. Get the printout from my PC.]]

task_one_overview.text: ![CDATA[Hey...anyone at all... I'm at home. Need a little help collecting our 5 pets.]]

task_one_objective.text: ![CDATA[Gather 5 Loud pets and deliver to Lucy.]]

task_two_overview.text: ![CDATA[So... we need to get Izzy the lizard too. Poor Izzy, I know what it's like to be ignored.]]

task_one_overview.text: ![CDATA[ASSISTANCE! I need 2 drops of lavender essence NOW! üî•üî•üî•]]

task_one_objective.text: ![CDATA[Get a bottle of lavender essence to Lola.]]

task_two_overview.text: ![CDATA[ASSISTANCE! Any grown-up, you have 2 minutes to turn this oven off or this cake is BURNT TO A CRISP!]]

task_two_objective.text: ![CDATA[TIMED TASK! Get to Clyde's house and turn the oven off for Lola.]]

task_one_overview.text: ![CDATA[Hey guys, Vanzilla needs work, I'll need the radium coolant ‚ò†Ô∏è I stored in Clyde's locker. We all know the code is his one true love, but maybe Clyde should be the one to get it.]]

task_one_objective.text: ![CDATA[Deliver the coolant from Clyde's locker to Lana.]]

task_two_overview.text: ![CDATA[Ok, it looks like the alternator is gone. There's only one thing that can fix this, nails! I need like, 6 of 'em.]]

task_two_objective.text: ![CDATA[Collect 6 Nails and deliver them to Lana.]]

task_one_overview.text: ![CDATA[I‚Äôm piping lemonade to the park. Linc, can you turn the Lynn‚Äôs Table taps on? (The taps are numbered accordingly)]]

task_one_objective.text: ![CDATA[Turn on the taps at Lynn's table.]]

task_two_overview.text: ![CDATA[There's a pipe leak in Ketcham park. Can someone get Clyde's duct tape and patch the pipe please? ]]

task_two_objective.text: ![CDATA[Collect the duct tape from Clyde's house to patch the pipe.]]

task_one_overview.text: ![CDATA[Hey hey, I'm buying Lori's gift, can someone get a credit card from Leni?]]

task_one_objective.text: ![CDATA[Deliver Leni's Credit Card to the mall.]]

task_two_overview.text: ![CDATA[Okey dokey, the store will deliver the gift to the park. It'll wait there for EXACTLY 1 minute. Make sure you're present for the present!]]

task_two_objective.text: ![CDATA[Meet the delivery van within the time limit. It'll be in the east of the park next to the rosebushes.]]

task_one_overview.text: ![CDATA[Hey, I'm at the school - recording a sweet party mixtape riff, BUT the power is at a 6. I need it turned up to like, 11.]]

task_two_overview.text: ![CDATA[Guys, walk this way. I only have a tape deck and I'm all out of cassettes. Won't you please, please help me?]]

task_one_overview.text: ![CDATA[Ok, I'm at Burpin' Burgers picking up the party food but I lost the order ticket! Can someone help me out?]]

task_one_objective.text: ![CDATA[Find the order ticket and get it to Leni.]]

task_two_overview.text: ![CDATA[New problemo! Now they're saying they want me to pay them, can you believe it?! I need $28.10c. Can you bring it to me please?]]

alert.text: ![CDATA[Hurry up! I cant wait much longer you slow coach!!!]]
![CDATA[WHERE WERE YOU? The cake is ruined! Ugh. I'll let you know when the backup cake is ready.]]
![CDATA[Uh-oh, you failed to deliver. Make sure you're there next time. I'll let you know.]]

lori_win.text:
![CDATA[OMG...
YOU GUYS
ARE LIKE...
THE SWEETEST!
‚ù§Ô∏èÔ∏è‚ù§Ô∏èÔ∏è‚ù§Ô∏èÔ∏è]]

chat.text: ![CDATA[There's a strong north easterly wind heading in. Do you have those heavy items?]]
![CDATA[Hmm, I didn't accurately account for relative wind speed fluctuations when placing that blanket.]]
![CDATA[If that wind shifts by 4 degrees it could cause an annoying and disastrous rustling of leaves.]]
![CDATA[I really need that printout, you'll find it on my computer.]]
![CDATA[Amount of help I need is currently zero. Has anyone else messaged you?]]
![CDATA[I won't message you again, we're all squared up here.]]
![CDATA[Don't take too long getting here, Fangs gets bitey if he's made to wait.]]
![CDATA[Thanks again. Fangs wouldn't miss this party for the world. I'll call if I need more help.]]
![CDATA[No Fangs, there is no blood in the birthday cake. Not this year.]]
![CDATA[I need Izzy the Lizard. There's a dead fly here with her name on it.]]
![CDATA[Thank you for the help. Izzy really appreciates it.]]
![CDATA[I have no more party chores, you can go help someone else.]]
![CDATA[I've baked billions of cakes, why would I need any help from you?]]
![CDATA[Pinch of saaalt... dash of liiime... Leave me aloooone.]]
![CDATA[Did you get that Lavender essence? WELL GET IT TO ME!]]
![CDATA[Just because you guys got the lavender essence doesn't mean you get any baking credit. This is 100% Lola.]]
![CDATA[Maybe I could make a second cake. Juuuust for me....ARE YOU STILL HERE?!]]
![CDATA[I'd do it myself but I'm a child. Do you want me to be HOSPITALIZED?]]
![CDATA[You're WASTING TIME.]]
![CDATA[WHERE WERE YOU? The cake is ruined! Ugh. I'll let you know when the backup cake is ready.]]
![CDATA[This will be the highlight of my party... I mean, Lori's party.]]
![CDATA[My only job was the cake. If you want to help someone else check your phone messages.]]
![CDATA[Soon as I get the old girl working I can load her up. I'll buzz you if I need help.]]
![CDATA[Hmm, I'll either need to get my plug-nosed, three-quarter wrench-nozzle or hit it with a brick.]]
![CDATA[Hey! Get the coolant. CODE HINT: it's 5674.]]
![CDATA[You didn't touch that coolant did you? No reason, I'm sure it's all fine.]]
![CDATA[Hey I found a nickel! Oh, it's holding the crankshaft in place.]]
![CDATA[Can't fix a van without nails. Can you bring them over?]]
![CDATA[She's good to go, I can take it from here.]]
![CDATA[My job is all wrapped up here. Has anyone else messaged you?]]
![CDATA[I'm on lemonade duty, I have a plan though. Can I message you later?]]
![CDATA[Hey! Get the wrench and get to Lynn's Table.]]
![CDATA[This is the greatest idea ever, lemonade on tap. I shouldn't need anymore help.]]
![CDATA[Maybe I could sell this idea to the water company.]]
![CDATA[We're wasting precious lemonade here, can someone get Clyde's duct tape and fix the leak!?]]
![CDATA[This party is going to be awesome. Nothing for me to do but wait.]]
![CDATA[Ugh, I've had WAY too much lemonade.]]
![CDATA[I don't need any help at PRESENT. But I'll be sure to let you know.]]
![CDATA[I know what Lori's getting for her birthday. She's getting older!]]
![CDATA[Don't dilly-dally with the dollars. I need that credit card!]]
![CDATA[I'm all set thanks. Just thinking of some birthday puns.]]
![CDATA[Do tortoises have SHELLabrations? No that's terrible.]]
![CDATA[They should label the cake 'Candle with care'.]]
![CDATA[Hurry it up, time's a ticking.]]
![CDATA[If you can make it in time you're really GIFTED.]]
![CDATA[Uh-oh, you failed to deliver. Make sure you're there next time. I'll let you know.]]
![CDATA[The gift is A-OK. How's everything else shaping up?]]
![CDATA[Birthday gift - Tick. Birthday card - Tick. Tiny parasitic insect - That's a tick too!]]
![CDATA[This party is going to rock, because I'm in charge of the tunes! I'll let you know if I need help.]]
![CDATA[Dudes! I'm running on empty here. Can someone find the power box in this place?]]
![CDATA[Thanks to whoever switched the power on. I should be all good from here.]]
![CDATA[I wonder if there are any noise restrictions in the park.]]
![CDATA[Hey, can I get that cassette tape now?]]
![CDATA[The tunes are the most important part of a party, and they're all ready to play.]]
![CDATA[I don't need any more help, unless you have a way of playing this even louder.]]
![CDATA[I'm sure I came here for a reason. No don't tell me, I can figure it out.]]
![CDATA[Burpin' Burgers. Are the burgers burping or is it the customers?]]
![CDATA[I think I maaaay have lost that ticket in Ketcham Park.]]
![CDATA[Thanks to you guys, they're cooking the burgers right now!]]
![CDATA[Those burgers smell a bit funny. Oh wait, that's the trash can.]]
![CDATA[Hey, Burpin' Burgers are flipping out here. Did you get the money?]]
![CDATA[I ordered two types. Hamburgers and beefburgers.]]
![CDATA[I don't think I need anymore help. Did I message you again?]]
![CDATA[No way am I crawling in there. Someone else can do it.]]
![CDATA[No way am I going in there.  Maybe someone else can do it.]]
![CDATA[Ooh, I really can‚Äôt touch that, I have allergies!]]
![CDATA[Only Ronnie Anne can sign for this.]]
![CDATA[That‚Äôs Clyde‚Äôs locker, only Clyde can open it.]]
![CDATA[No way. I‚Äôm super-forbidden to touch fuseboxes.]]
![CDATA[I promised my parents I wouldn‚Äôt touch anything over 350¬∫F.]]

desc.text: ![CDATA[It's no world record, but you're getting the hang of this walking around stuff.]]
![CDATA[Who cares about shoe leather. You're going places!]]
![CDATA[You've played with the whole gang. That deserves a medal.]]
![CDATA[...or maybe you've fallen asleep, either way, here's a medal.]]
![CDATA[Oooooh, someone likes Ronnie Anne. Not teasing, we think she's great too.]]
![CDATA[A medal just for going home? Pfft, they're giving them away these days.]]
![CDATA[Oh you made it home? What do you want, a medal? Well here you go.]]
![CDATA[You've been here more times than the teachers. Take a medal.]]
![CDATA[Looks like you've spoken to everyone. I hoped it helped.]]
![CDATA[You use that phone so much you might as well tape it to your face.]]
![CDATA[Ok, you got them all, now what are you going to do with them?]]
![CDATA[You found all Luan's lost pranks. We'd return them to her, but some of them need to go back to the police evidence locker.]]
![CDATA[Lily really should look after these. ]]
![CDATA[Now Lynn Snr. can make his infamous Wiener Schnitzel!....Unfortunately.]]
![CDATA[No golf club? No silly jumper? You're making a mockery of the sport - And for that, you get a medal.]]
![CDATA[How did you get in? How do you get out! Enjoy this medal while you think about what you've done.]]
![CDATA[It's not every day you get a medal for picking up a stinking old fish. But today is that day!]]
![CDATA[See a flag, pick it up, and all day long you'll have good luck. And this sweet medal.]]
![CDATA[Yes it's a paperweight, please stop asking.]]
![CDATA[This seems perfect for, I don't know, holding down a large mat.]]
![CDATA[Seems heavy, now who was asking for heavy things?]]
![CDATA[I'm sure this will come in handy, logs always come in handy.]]
![CDATA[Technically, owning this is treason, but who's going to argue with Lisa?]]
![CDATA[Ah, I'm sure Clyde will be completely fine with looking after a dog.]]
![CDATA[Or 'horrific allergy machine' as he's known in the McBride house.]]
![CDATA[Technically the fourth Geo, but we don't like to bring that up.]]
![CDATA[Some say he looks angry because he hates the name Walt.]]
![CDATA[Careful. Lucy has a special set of curses for those who hurt Fangs.]]
![CDATA[Lithuanian liquid lizard lure (Large)]]
![CDATA[How could we forget Izzy? Pretty easily actually, she's basically a green log with eyes.]]
![CDATA[Wow, you actually found some! Phew, you don't want to anger Lola when she's holding a hand mixer.]]
![CDATA[It's a nail, a bit on the large side.]]
![CDATA[This nail actually has an interesting history, but that's for another day.]]
![CDATA[What else to say? It's a nail.]]
![CDATA[Yup, a nail much like any other.]]
![CDATA[Nailed it! Sorry.]]
![CDATA[Metal spike, otherwise known as a nail.]]
![CDATA[They don't make 'em like this anymore. That's because 'this' was banned in 1954.]]
![CDATA[Not to be confused with the tape used for fixing ducks.]]
![CDATA[So called because it was invented by a team of gibbon engineers. True story.]]
![CDATA[Dough, bucks, bread, moolah, in plastic form.]]
![CDATA[If this doesn't make her cry I don't know what will. Oh hang on, onions would also work.]]
![CDATA[A cassette tape? Well, it's like a CD. A CD? Well it's like a vinyl record. A Viny... Oh never mind.]]
![CDATA[Woah. Twenty actual dollars. Guard it well.]]
![CDATA[It's filthy and it's stinking. But hey, it's legal tender.]]
![CDATA[A dollar bill, useful for buying all types of stuff.]]
![CDATA[There's money lying all over this town. Maybe you could turn professional.]]
![CDATA[One hundred cents, in paper form.]]
![CDATA[A small, shiny, precious coin.]]
![CDATA[It simply says 'Burgers, lots of them. Think of a number, double it. Just give me all the burgers.']]
![CDATA[Unless there is a type of bird which lays perfectly round plastic eggs, this is probably a golf ball.]]
![CDATA[When life gives you lemons... save them for some future medal task!]]
![CDATA[A wiener, a hot dog, a long-sausage, a flipperty-jobbler. Ok one of those is made up.]]
![CDATA[Hopefully from a hen, possibly from a large pigeon.]]
![CDATA[Love them or hate them, it's still a fun word to say.]]
![CDATA[Bread? Never heard of it, we refer to it as raw toast.]]
![CDATA[You found it! Good, there's no room for missed-steaks in this game.]]
![CDATA[One of nature's most terrifying predators, aww.]]
![CDATA[Like most Teddies, this one is called Teddy. How confusing for them all.]]
![CDATA[Apparently they used to have feathers, but that makes them look way less scary.]]
![CDATA[A lovely rabbit with lovely big ears.]]
![CDATA[Ah, Bun Bun. Faithful friend through thick and thin.]]
![CDATA[Give it a big hug and be thankful it's not a real bear.]]
![CDATA[Lily‚Äôs first ever baby bottle. Tooth marks, everywhere.]]
![CDATA[Do not taste it. Repeat, do NOT taste it.]]
![CDATA[Lily‚Äôs favorite drink, but only because she‚Äôs never tried chocolate milkshake.]]
![CDATA[Urgh, this one is sticky with pur√©ed carrots.]]
![CDATA[One of many. Lily has one for every day of the week.]]
![CDATA[Fun fact: If you hold it up to ear and listen carefully, you‚Äôll get an earful of milk.]]
![CDATA[This has been lost for so long the milk has turned to yogurt.]]
![CDATA[It's a chicken. It's made from rubber. It's hilarious.]]
![CDATA[A fake spider. 100% as terrifying as a real spider.]]
![CDATA[Advertized as 'The only gag that will make you gag'.]]
![CDATA[It still has the imprint of Lana's face on it. Poor Lana.]]
![CDATA[Instantly hilarious-izes any face.]]
![CDATA[One of Luan's favorites. Lynn Sr. has fallen for it 34 out of 34 times.]]
![CDATA[What is this? Some kind of joke?]]
![CDATA[Often called the Stars & Stripes. Nobody knows why though.]]
